what_am_i_looking_at.title: O que estou vendo?
what_am_i_looking_at.description: Você está visualizando uma mensagem segura que foi compartilhada com você através do OneTime Secret. Este conteúdo é exibido apenas uma vez e depois é excluído permanentemente de nossos servidores.

can_i_view_again.title: Posso ver este segredo novamente mais tarde?
can_i_view_again.description: Não. Por motivos de segurança, este segredo só pode ser visualizado uma vez. Depois de fechar esta página, o conteúdo será excluído permanentemente e não poderá ser recuperado por ninguém, nem mesmo por nós.

how_to_copy.title: Como salvo esta informação?
how_to_copy.description: Use o botão 'Copiar para a Área de Transferência' para copiar todo o segredo. Para segredos mais longos, certifique-se de verificar se copiou o conteúdo completo antes de sair desta página.

is_my_viewing_tracked.title: A minha visualização deste segredo é rastreada?
is_my_viewing_tracked.description: O remetente será notificado que seu segredo foi visualizado, mas não rastreamos quem o visualizou ou de qual local. Sua privacidade está protegida.

secret_view_faq.one_time_warning: Quando você sair ou atualizar esta página, este segredo será excluído permanentemente e não poderá ser recuperado por ninguém.

COMMON.burn_this_secret_confirm_hint: Remover um segredo é permanente e não pode ser desfeito

homepage.cta_subtitle: Eleve sua marca e compartilhe com confiança
homepage.password_generation_description: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.
homepage.protip1: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: Esta mensagem será criptografada com sua senha mestre.
private.only_see_once: você só verá isso uma vez
private.created_securely: Your secret has been created securely
private.the-burn-feature-lets-you-permanently-de: The burn feature lets you permanently delete a secret before anyone views it. This is useful if you need to revoke access or shared the wrong information. Once burned, the secret cannot be recovered.
private.your-secret-will-remain-available-for-re: Your secret will remain available for {0} or until it's viewed, whichever comes first. After either condition is met, the secret is permanently deleted.
private.for-security-reasons-we-cant-recover-los: For security reasons, we can't recover lost secret links. You'll need to create a new secret and generate a new link. We recommend copying the link immediately after creation.
private.we-display-the-value-for-you-so-that-you: We display the value for you so that you can verify it but we do that once so that if someone gets this private page (in your browser history or if you accidentally send the private link instead of the secret one), they won't see the secret value.
private.why-can-i-only-see-the-secret-value-once: Why can I only see the secret value once?
private.burning-a-secret-permanently-deletes-it-: Burning a secret permanently deletes it before anyone can read it. The recipient will see a message indicating the secret doesn't exist. This is useful if you accidentally share the wrong information or need to prevent access.
private.what-happens-when-i-burn-a-secret: What happens when I burn a secret?
private.and-never-stored-in-its-original-form-th: and never stored in its original form. This approach means we can't access or recover your secret - only someone with the correct passphrase can.
private.each-secret-can-only-be-viewed-once-afte: Each secret can only be viewed once. After viewing, it's permanently deleted from our servers. This ensures your sensitive information isn't accidentally exposed through browser history or mistakenly shared private links.

shared.requires_passphrase: Esta mensagem requere uma senha mestre:
shared.viewed_own_secret: Você viu seu próprio segredo. Este não está mais disponível para ninguém.
shared.you_created_this_secret: Você criou este segredo. Se você o ver, o destinatário não será capaz de vê-lo.
shared.pre_reveal_default: Click the button below to reveal your secure message.
shared.post_reveal_default: Your secure message is shown below.
shared.secret_was_truncated: A mensagem foi cortada porque tinha mais de

feedback.when-you-submit-feedback-well-see: When you submit feedback, we'll see:

security.thank-you-for-helping-us-keep-onetime-se: Thank you for helping us keep Onetime Secret secure and excellent!
security.we-take-your-privacy-seriously-all-repor: We take your privacy seriously. All reports will be kept confidential, and we will work with you to ensure that any details of the vulnerability are not disclosed until a fix is in place.
security.if-the-vulnerability-is-declined-we-will: : If the vulnerability is declined, we will provide a detailed explanation as to why it was not accepted.
security.if-the-vulnerability-is-accepted-we-will: : If the vulnerability is accepted, we will work on a fix and aim to release it as soon as possible. You will be notified once the fix is deployed.
security.you-can-expect-to-receive-updates-on-the: : You can expect to receive updates on the status of your report at least once every 7 days until the issue is resolved or a decision is made.
security.we-will-conduct-an-initial-assessment-of: : We will conduct an initial assessment of the vulnerability within 14 business days.
security.you-will-receive-an-acknowledgment-of-yo: : You will receive an acknowledgment of your report within 5 business days.
security.your-contact-information-for-follow-up-q: Your contact information for follow-up questions.
security.a-detailed-description-of-the-vulnerabil: A detailed description of the vulnerability.
security.include-as-much-information-as-possible-: : Include as much information as possible about the vulnerability. This should include:
security.with-the-subject-line-vulnerability-repo: with the subject line "Vulnerability Report: [Brief Description]".
security.if-you-discover-a-security-vulnerability: If you discover a security vulnerability within this project, we encourage you to report it as soon as possible. Here's how you can do it:
security.if-you-are-using-an-unsupported-version-: If you are using an unsupported version, we strongly recommend upgrading to one of the supported versions to ensure you receive the latest security updates.
security.we-provide-security-updates-for-the-foll: We provide security updates for the following versions of our project:
security.we-take-the-security-of-this-project-ser: We take the security of this project seriously and appreciate your efforts to responsibly disclose vulnerabilities. This document outlines our security policy and provides guidelines on how to report vulnerabilities.

trust_points: We can't access your information even if we wanted to (which we don't). For example, if you share a password, we don't know the username or even the application it's for.

If you use a passphrase (available under "Privacy Options"), we include that in the encryption key for the secret. We only store a bcrypt hash of the passphrase, making it impossible for us to decrypt your secret once it's saved.
Our code is {openSourceLink}. You can review it yourself or even run your own instance if you prefer.
We use industry-standard security practices, including HTTPS for all connections and encryption at rest for stored data.
passphrase_points: We never store the unencrypted secret or the passphrase.
The bcrypt hash cannot be used to decrypt the secret.
Without the original passphrase, the encrypted secret cannot be decrypted, even by us.
This means that even if our servers were compromised, your secret would remain secure as long as the passphrase remains unknown.
faq.why_use_description: When you send people passwords and private links via email or chat, there are copies of that information stored in many places. If you use a Onetime link instead, the information persists for a single viewing which means it can't be read by someone else later. This allows you to send sensitive information in a safe way knowing it's seen by one person only. Think of it like a self-destructing message.
faq.file_limitation_title: Why can't I send pictures or other kinds of files?
faq.file_limitation_description: Our service is designed specifically for text-based secrets to ensure maximum security and simplicity. Files, especially images, can contain metadata that might unintentionally reveal information about the sender or recipient. By focusing on text, we can guarantee that no additional data is transmitted beyond what you explicitly type. If you need to share a file securely, we recommend using a dedicated secure file transfer service. We may consider adding support for files in the future if there are compelling use cases for it.
faq.text_copy_title: But I can copy the secret text. What's the difference?
faq.text_copy_description: True, but all you have is text. Images and other file types can contain metadata and other potentially revealing information about the sender or recipient. Again, this is simply to ensure that no private information is shared outside of the intended recipient.
faq.secret_retrieval_title: Can I retrieve a secret that has already been shared?
faq.secret_retrieval_description: Nope. We display it once and then delete it. After that, it's gone forever.
faq.account_difference_title: What's the difference between anonymous use and having a free account?
faq.account_difference_description: Anonymous users can create secrets that last up to {anonymousTtlDays} days and have a maximum size of {anonymousSizeKB} KB. Free account holders get extended benefits: secrets can last up to {defaultTtlDays} days and can be up to {defaultSizeKB} KB in size. Account holders also get access to additional features like burn-before-reading options, which allow senders to delete secrets before they're received.
faq.law_enforcement_title: How do you handle data requests from law enforcement or other third parties?
faq.law_enforcement_description: We designed our system with privacy in mind. We don't store secrets after they've been viewed, and we don't keep access logs beyond the minimum necessary. This means that in most cases, we simply don't have any data to provide in response to such requests. For more details, please review our {privacyPolicyLink}.
faq.trust_description: We've designed our system with privacy and security as top priorities. Here's why you can trust us:
faq.passphrase_title: How does the passphrase option work?
faq.passphrase_description: When you use a passphrase, we encrypt your secret on our servers using the passphrase you provide. We don't store the passphrase itself, only a bcrypt hash of it. This hash is used to verify the passphrase when the recipient enters it. Here's why this is secure:
faq.passphrase_final_note: Remember, the security of your secret depends on the strength of your passphrase and how securely you communicate it to the recipient.

intro.paragraph1: Hi, I'm {name}, the creator of Onetime Secret. What started in 2012 as a simple, secure way to share sensitive information has grown beyond our wildest expectations. Over a decade later, we're facilitating the secure sharing of millions of secrets monthly, with use cases we never imagined.
intro.paragraph2: The first half of 2024 has been our busiest period yet. We're grateful that people have continued to use and share our product for more than a decade. We're currently working on improvements that we think will make the service even more useful — we'll share more details soon.
intro.paragraph3: True to our roots, {githubLink} on GitHub. As we navigate the evolving landscape of digital privacy and security, we're committed to transparency and continual improvement.
intro.paragraph4: Thank you for being part of our journey. Here's to another decade of secure, ephemeral sharing.
intro.feedback_hint: If you have any questions, there is a feedback form at the bottom of (almost) every page.

meta.were-making-onetime-secret-available-in-: We're making {onetime-secret} available in multiple languages. Since this is a new feature, you may encounter translation errors or awkward phrasing. Your feedback helps us improve - if you spot any issues, please {send-feedback}
meta.translations-are-new-spotted-an-error: Translations are new. Spotted an error? {send-feedback}
meta.we-recently-added-translations: We recently added translations. Spotted an error? {send-feedback}
meta.privacy-and-security-should-be-accessibl: Privacy and security should be accessible to everyone, regardless of language. We're adding translations to help both our users and their message recipients better understand how to safely use and access secure messages and links. Since this is a new feature, you might encounter some translation errors or unclear instructions. To help us improve the clarity and accuracy of our translations, especially for critical security-related content, please {send-feedback} if you spot any issues

as-we-add-new-features-our-translations-: As we add new features, our translations gradually need updates to stay current. This affects both onetimesecret.com and thousands of self-hosted installations worldwide.
to-understand-the-specific-regulations-a: To understand the specific regulations and protections that apply to your account, please
each-jurisdiction-maintains-separate-leg: Each jurisdiction maintains separate legal compliance and data governance. While you can create accounts in multiple jurisdictions, they remain legally distinct with no data sharing between regulatory zones.
this-regulatory-framework-is-determined-: This regulatory framework is determined by your access domain:
your-account-and-data-are-protected-unde: Your account and data are protected under the laws and regulations of
secrets-are-designed-to-be-viewed-only-o: Secrets are designed to be viewed only once. This link may have already been accessed, expired, or been manually deleted by the sender.
contact-the-person-who-sent-you-this-lin: Contact the person who sent you this link and ask them to create a new secret. Let them know you weren't able to access the original information.
customize-your-app-preferences-and-setti: Customize your app preferences and settings
ai-generated-content-disclaimer: AI-generated content for demonstration. Not from an actual person or company.
you-can-safely-close-this-tab: You can close this window when done.
enter-the-secret-content-to-share-here: Enter the secret content to share here
when-ready-click-the-view-secret-button-: When ready, click the button at the top of the page to reveal your one-time message.
yes-after-viewing-the-secret-is-permanen: Yes. After viewing, the secret is permanently deleted from our servers, ensuring your privacy.
onetime-secret-is-a-secure-way-to-share-: Onetime Secret is a secure way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after a single viewing.
before-you-open-it-heres-what-you-should: Before you open it, here's what you should know:
a-secure-one-time-message-awaits-you: A secure, one-time message awaits you.
please-enter-your-new-password-below-mak: Please enter your new password below. Make sure it's at least 8 characters long and includes a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.
enter-your-email-address-below-and-well-: Enter your email address below, and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
remember-to-include-your-email-if-youre-: - remember to include your email if you're not logged in. Every translation helps more people communicate securely.
start-a-new-translation-from-our: Start a new translation from our
update-a-language-directly-through-our-g: Update a language directly through our GitHub project
review-existing-translations-using-the-l: Review existing translations using the language selector above
ready-to-help-some-ways-to-contribute: Ready to help? Some ways to contribute:
the-following-people-have-donated-their-: The following people have donated their time to help expand the reach of Onetime Secret:
fork-on-github-and-submit-a-pr: Fork on GitHub and Submit a PR
your-language-skills-can-help-expand-acc: Your language skills can help expand access to secure communication.
thanks-to-our-community-we-support-over-: Thanks to our community, we support over 20 languages today. However, with our rapid development pace, many translations need updates to stay current. This affects both onetimesecret.com and the thousands of self-hosted installations worldwide.
since-2012-onetime-secret-has-provided-a: Since 2012, Onetime Secret has provided a secure way to share sensitive information worldwide. With users across regions where English isn't the primary language, accurate translations are essential for making secure communication accessible to everyone.
oops-the-page-you-are-looking-for-doesnt: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
thanks-for-helping-onetime-secret-improv: Thanks for helping Onetime Secret improve. It means a lot.
weve-built-this-tool-to-help-you-share-s: We've built this tool to help you share sensitive info securely, and your real-world experiences are crucial for focusing our efforts. It helps us figure out what to work on next and how to make the service better for everyone.
hey-there-thanks-for-stopping-by-our-fee: Hey there, thanks for stopping by our feedback page. Your input isn't just welcome - it's crucial.
a-note-from-delano-founder-of-onetime-se: A note from Delano, founder of Onetime Secret
this-is-a-private-instance-only-authoriz: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.
that-information-is-no-longer-available: This secret has been viewed or expired.
if-youre-unsure-what-to-do-next-please-f: If you're unsure what to do next, please follow up with the person who sent you this link for more information.
information-shared-through-our-service-c: Information shared through our service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted from our servers to ensure confidentiality. This approach helps protect your sensitive data by limiting its exposure and preventing unauthorized access.
includes-all-features-and-unlimited-shar: All plans include privacy features and unlimited sharing capacity
includes-all-data-locality-options: All plans include choice of data locality: {0} regions
elevate-your-secure-sharing-with-custom-: Elevate your secure sharing with custom domains, unlimited capacity, and enterprise-grade features.
secure-your-brand-and-build-customer-tru: Secure your brand and build customer trust with links from your domain. Perfect for businesses that value privacy and professionalism.
identity-tier-not-found-in-product-tiers: Identity tier not found in product tiers
onetime-secret-helps-us-share-sensitive-: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.
information-shared-through-this-service-: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
were-sorry-but-an-unexpected-error-occur: We're sorry, but an unexpected error occurred while processing your request. Our team has been notified and we're working to fix it.
the-page-youre-looking-for-doesnt-exist-: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Don't worry, it happens to the best of us!
unable-to-load-data-due-to-data-format-i: Unable to load data due to data format issues. Please try again later.
keep-this-token-secure-it-provides-full-: 🔐 Keep this token secure! It provides full access to your account.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-permanently-del: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
any-secrets-you-wish-to-remove: Any secrets you wish to remove,
secrets-will-remain-active-until-they-ex: Secrets will remain active until they expire.
it-may-take-a-few-minutes-for-your-ssl-c: It may take a few minutes for your SSL certificate to take effect.
dns-changes-can-take-as-little-as-60-sec: DNS changes can take as little as 60 seconds -- or up to 24 hours -- to take effect.
add-this-hostname-to-your-dns-configurat: Add this hostname to your DNS configuration:
follow-these-steps-to-verify-domain-owne: Follow these steps to verify domain ownership and elevate your online presence:
are-you-sure-you-want-to-deactivate-your: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? All of your data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.
what-leading-ai-says-about-us: What leading AI says about us
it-was-based-on-the-content-of-the-page-: It was based on the content of the page and does not represent an actual person or company.
this-content-is-ai-generated-based-on-th: This content is AI-generated based on the content of this page and does not represent an actual person or company.
are-you-sure-you-want-to-remove-this-dom: Are you sure you want to remove this domain? This action cannot be undone.
